pr_title: Use Maven profile for running Quarkus based adapters in ITs

timeline.message:
Use Maven profile for running Quarkus based adapters in ITs

The ITs can now be run by activating the "protocol-adapters-quarkus"
Maven profile.

Signed-off-by: Kai Hudalla <kai.hudalla@bosch.io>

timeline.bodyText: Maybe keep profile name a bit more generic as I can see we use Quarkus for other services not just protocol adapters? Or you want to configure that with separate profiles?

replies.bodyText: No, I do not think that we need to use separate profiles for it. How about changing it to a more generic name once we start migrating the first non-adapter component?
